types.name: Wretch
quotes: Why have you disturbed my rest?!
No... not again...
I was finally at peace!
Leave me be! I beg you!
What fresh torment is this?
blessing_quotes: A small mercy in this torment.

types.name: Imp
quotes: You DARE summon me?!
I'll burn you for this interruption!
My nap was just getting good...
Fine! But I'm not happy about it!
This better be worth my time, mortal.
blessing_quotes: I suppose you're useful after all.

types.name: Hollow
quotes: ...where am I?
The void was preferable to this.
You've made a mistake.
I remember nothing... only darkness.
Why drag me from oblivion?

types.name: Cur
quotes: Who's there?! Show yourself!
I was sleeping in the grave!
Do you have treats? No? Then why summon me!
I'll bite! Don't think I won't!
My eternal rest was disturbed for THIS?

types.name: Scamp
quotes: Oi! I was in the middle of something!
You can't just yank me around like that!
Rude! So rude!
Fine, fine... what do you want?
This is kidnapping! Soul-napping!

types.name: Varmint
quotes: Squeak! Who woke me?!
I'll gnaw your ankles for this!
I was hiding from the afterlife!
Small I may be, but my grudge is large!
You'll pay for disturbing my burrow!
blessing_quotes: Okay, maybe you're not so bad.

types.name: Knave
quotes: Clever... pulling me from the shadows.
What's your game, summoner?
I was cheating death. You ruined it.
You'll regret this... eventually.
I suppose we can make a deal...
blessing_quotes: Perhaps you're not a fool after all.

types.name: Brute
quotes: WHO DARES?!
I'll crush you for this!
My rage knows no grave!
You want violence? I AM VIOLENCE!
I was having the best nightmare!

types.name: Blight
quotes: Ssss... you reek of desperation.
I was spreading through the earth... now this.
You've invited pestilence into your world.
I shall rot everything you cherish.
Disturbing me was your final mistake.
